subject: Parameterized Test with Rules (withou special Runner)

If anybody wants to use parameterized Test, but can't use the Parameterized=
 Runner, she migh be interested in an approach based on Rules:

http://blog=
.schauderhaft.de/2012/12/16/writing-parameterized-tests-with-junit-rules/

=
The idea is to have the current parameter value available from the rule and=
 make the rule iterate through the different values, passed in at construct=
ion time. 

The source code is available at github: https://github.com/scha=
uder/parameterizedTestsWithRules
